Like Moses descending from the mount with a Needler in either hand, he bedazzled and amazed us with visions of "an enormous playground stitched together from some of Halo's most iconic maps of yore; Warthogs and Mongooses roaming the lands; players racing to the M41 SPNKR as it spawns; grappling to a rooftop and laying down covering fire; some contrived reason as to why there's a circle of poison gas closing in... but hey, rings are what Halo does best, right? It's 100% doable."
Ed Thorn has always been a journalist of great sagacity and supernatural insight, so it was of no surprise to the RPS editors of the era when rumours bubbled up a few months later that Certain Affinity had partnered with 343 Industries (nowadays Halo Studios) to make Halo battle royale a reality. These rumours have now been confirmed by Certain Affinity's former design director Mike Clopper, who says the now-cancelled mode could have been a "game changer".
 Read more
articles.title: Halo's battle royale mode "could have been a game changer", says former Infinite dev, and you know what, I'll buy it

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
Ever been in a position where two people are really going at each other, hurling pointed jabs and insults back and forth, and you're stuck in the middle? Well then, perhaps you'll empathise with the enemies in Archons, a twin-stick Vampire Survivors-like where you control two characters at once, and attacks bounce between them automatically as they move about the arena. I gave the Steam Next Fest demo a quick whirl today, and after a couple of swift attempts (I died horribly fast), I realised this could become a bit of a danger to my free time, so I've put it away for now.
Read more
articles.title: Archons doubles the chaos of Vampire Survivors by giving you two characters to control at once

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Nepos Games are the two-person studio behind Nebuchadnezzar, which Nate Crowley called "two thirds of an outstanding historical city builder". They've just informed me they're making a new building sim called County Of Fortune, out in Q4 2025. It ain't a city builder, though. In fact, it claims to have murdered the city builder in cold blood, which is unfortunate, because I was really looking forward to a round of Manor Lords later. 


"The city-builder is dead, long live the county-builder," declares the press release, brandishing the husk of SimCity over its head. OK, I'll bite - what's a county-builder then? Well, it's sort of several city-builders having an argument. In County Of Fortune, you seed and grow a number of settlements side by side, then manage their economic and social relations. In other words, it's a game that appears to simulate the phenomenon of culture clash. I'm not sure all this amounts to the wholesale death of a genre, but it's certainly intriguing. Here's the Steam page, and here's a trailer.
 
Read more
articles.title: In medieval strategy sim County Of Fortune you run a whole county's worth of quarrelling towns

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Praise the gods, it's Hades 2 update day, and developers Supergiant are not mucking about. They have bolstered the nippy roguelike with a heap of shiny new things in this "Olympian Update", including a new weapon with homing attacks, a liver-pecking boss fight, two new animal familiars, and the home region of the Gods - mount Olympus. It's probably the biggest update they've made yet in terms of fresh sights. And by "fresh sights", I mean Dionysus sporting a leopard-print thong. Yikes.
Read more
articles.title: Hades 2 adds a boss fight against Prometheus and a lot more in a chunky update

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
In a recent chat with the Ian Games Network, IO Interactive boss Hakan Abrak said the Hitman developer "absolutely feel(s) like 20 plus years of training for the agent fantasy, creating an agent that travels the world and globetrotting whatnot, has given us some know-how" on bringing James Bond to the greasy screen ("greasy screen" is my new attempt at coining a "the big/small screen" but for games. I foresee big success.)
Abrak is so confident, in fact, that he reckons their Bond project might end up mirroring the World Of Assassination’s trilogy format. "But what's exciting about that project is that we actually got to do an original story,” Abrak says. “So it's not a gamification of a movie. It's completely beginning and becoming a story, hopefully for a big trilogy out there in the future."
It’s a fine interview, worth a read. But I must ask: how are the queues, Abrak? How am I supposed to get excited about a new IO game if you don’t mention the queues? 
Read more
articles.title: IO Interactive fail to mention if a potential Project 007 “trilogy” will feature Hitman’s glorious queues, so who’s to say whether it’s worth my time

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Leadership at Don’t Nod yesterday “presented a reorganisation project to the employee representative bodies,” via financials report, in response to "a balance sheet that highlights the need to secure the company's resources" following the underperformance of Jusant and Banishers: Ghosts of new Eden.
In plain terms, this means that up to 69 workers at the French company are at risk of layoffs due to an 11% year-on-year decline in operating revenue, via IGN. The number represents "29% of the Paris studio workforce", say the STJV.
Read more
articles.title: Leadership at Don’t Nod are "creating an atmosphere of extreme violence” with planned layoffs, says French game workers union

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
I punched a cultist in the face in Streets Of Rogue 2, just because. He started running away - something I would not allow. When another robed cultist spotted what was happening, he tried to intervene, and a kind of Benny Hill pursuit chain began. We ran across a beach, through public toilets, and into the surf. In the end I had to knock them both out. As they lay unconscious, I worried they might soon wake and tell someone what I had done. This can't happen, I hate accountability. I punched their unawake bodies toward the sea in an effort to float the evidence away. But after a few punches the first man exploded into chunks of flesh. I am a murderer now. I was supposed to be a chef.
Streets Of Rogue 2 has a demo out for Steam Next Fest, and while a lot of features are locked up behind the word "UNAVAILABLE" in red font, there's still quite a lot of mischief for you to get up to.
Read more
articles.title: The demo for Streets Of Rogue 2 lets you roleplay as the world's most violent chef

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Archetype Entertainment and Blur Studio's space RPG Exodus was announced back in December, and was broadly notable for a couple of things: 1) Matthew McConaughey plays a character, and 2) the game's story is woven around time dilation during faster than light travel, with star-hopping adventurers prosecuting a fight against evil Celestials over hundreds, perhaps thousands of years.
Now, it is notable for three things, the third thing being a cosmic blubber-spire of gurning faces who want to eat your ship and soul. Say hello to the Mara Yama, the ickiest Celestial faction so far. Here's a trailer, in which McConaughey does that thing where he lingers on the sibilants and makes you want to lean in and vigorously mess up his hair.
 Read more
articles.title: New trailer for Mass Effect wannabe Exodus features space-capable flesh cathedral whisperingly described by Matthew McConaughey

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The existence of Knights In Tight Spaces, sequel to Fights In Tight Spaces, implies the existence of an unknown quantity or perhaps, an infinity of follow-up games that rhyme with both of those. Frights In Tight Spaces is the obvious horror spin-off. Sleights In Tight Spaces would be an urban pick-pocketing sim. Fights In Trite Spaces is about arguing with people on social media. Ah, you could spend a whole article, indeed, a series of articles, just fleshing out the iterations. Fortunately, Knights In Tight Spaces has a new demo to distract me.
 
Read more
articles.title: Knights In Tight Spaces kicks the Tight Fight formula in the direction of fantasy role-playing

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Ah, what a pickle I’ve gotten myself into. I need to climb down from this table if I’m ever going to meet up with my teammates and finish the game, but the stupid zombies cannot get me if I stay up here. It’s an absolute gherkin, I tell you. A real cornichonundrum.
The steel pipe in my right hand is doing a decent job of whittling them down, and the torch in my left lets me see the expressions of impotent rage on their flaky faces. Still, the pipe won’t last forever - this is videogame steel, the crumbliest steel there is. Thank god No More Room In Hell 2 doesn’t bother with the hunger or rest parts of the survival equation. I can, in theory, stay on this table forever.
Read more
articles.title: No More Room In Hell 2 nails the terror of being isolated in a zombie outbreak, although you can just hide on a table if you want

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Twitch have temporarily banned an account run by streamer Asmongold, otherwise known as Zack Hoyt, after he expressed genocidal sentiments about Israel's killing of Palestinian people in Gaza. According to the eSports journalist Rod Breslau, he's been sent to the naughty step for a grand total of two weeks, which I'm sure will be a huge inconvenience and will really teach him the error of his ways. Assuming Breslau's sources are accurate, it's a great demonstration of Twitch's tolerance for streamers with big audiences, the kind of slap on the wrist you'd expect from a platform that recently reinstated Donald Trump's account after banning him in 2021 for the charge of inciting an insurrection.
 Read more
articles.title: Twitch gives streamer a reported 14-day ban for saying he's OK with the genocide of Palestinians

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Back in September, open world publisher Ubisoft put out a 3-days-weekly return to office mandate for their entire staff worldwide - a decision that French Video Game Workers Union (STJV) said was "made without any tangible justification or any consultation with the workers’ representatives". In response, the STJV called on staff in France to hold a three-day strike beginning yesterday, which the union reports to be underway with the participation of more than 700 workers, via Le Monde.
"This decision is announced immediately after the failure of the profit-sharing negotiations," STJV wrote at the time. “Exactly like previous salary negociations: management’s proposals were inacceptable, the negotiations’ timetable was appalling, and management was deaf to the proposals of the various Employee representatives."
 
Read more
articles.title: 700 Ubisoft staff in France hold strikes in response to worldwide return to office mandate from Assassin’s Creed publisher

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
"Do you have a ping of 1000 or something," my opponent asked, during my inaugural bout of Straftat. Ah yes, this is it, that sense of unpleasantly intimate sheepishness. That's the withering late-90s chatbox scorn I've been missing, in this age of glossy live service multiplayer. I hid under a stairwell in order to meditate upon my response, then laboriously typed: "No, I just suck." Right on cue, the other player tumbled into view and shredded me with an AK.
The player I met in my second match was more forgiving. "I honestly think the characters need more HP," they said, generously. My wrists need more HP, actually. My eyes and reflexes need urgent patching.
 
Read more
articles.title: I hope Straftat is 2024's breakout shooter, because the demo's 25 maps are gloriously unwholesome

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I’ve never learnt to drive, and while I’ve always told myself it’s impractical - unnecessary, expensive, potentially dangerous for someone with undiagnosed but, I suspect, incredibly likely dyspraxia - I’m not sure it’ll ever stop being one of those quiet regrets; the ambient type that don’t really bubble to the surface much unless I’m watching a Noah Gervais road trip video, but just float there and make my mood like, 1.5% worse at all times.
So maybe it’s just me, but there’s a sense of intense freedom and adventure to Keep Driving's Steam demo that belies its prosaic, tractor-tailing subject matter. The opening minutes are oddly silent, until Westkust’s Swirl blasts out from your radio as soon as you drive off toward your first destination - your mate’s house, to hang out and play console games. It comes on strong and sweet; a rush of wind through an open window on a warm morning.
Read more
articles.title: Keep Driving made me nostalgic for road trips I’ve never been on and places I’ve never seen

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Riot Games are cutting more jobs at their studios, the company announced today. This is the second time in a year the League of Legends developer has laid off workers. Chairman and co-founder of Riot, Marc Merrill, made the announcement yesterday, claiming that by cutting these jobs the company was "evolving League" and "investing heavily in solving today’s challenges". A total of 32 people have lost their jobs, mostly workers on League of Legends, according to a figure the developer gave to our sister site Eurogamer.
Read more
articles.title: Riot lay off more workers for the second time in a year - and add "evolving" to our big list of nonsense words companies use to describe job cuts

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
You might have caught this one during Day Of The Devs earlier this year. It’s stuck with me since because the developer Tanat seemed like a rad dude, and also because there’s nothing I cherish more than taking a bad pun and just absolutely going to town on it, marrow and all. Building Relationships is about buildings forming relationships in a Love Islandy scenario, though without the reality TV framing you might find in say, Crush House. But the real gag here is the commitment to the bit. Besides that, it’s just a really charming and fun N64-style 3D platformer.
It also features the sort wonky physics that definitely wouldn’t get Ninty’s seal of quality, but work brilliantly here, especially since your character consists largely of angles but still insists on, you know, performing motions.
Read more
articles.title: I am happy to report that Building Relationships has more than one joke, and most of them are pretty good

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Ukážeme si ovládání dvojice čipů OPL2 (DualOPL2), jak lze na OPL2 i OPL3 využít polyfonii a taktéž ovládání levého a pravého reproduktoru čipem OPL3, čímž se realizuje triviální stereo.
articles.title: Programování zvukových karet s čipem OPL3 nebo s dvojicí čipů OPL2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Kopřiva)
articles.description: V dnešním díle se podíváme na aktivně zneužívanou 0-day zranitelnost v systému FortiManager, výsledky soutěže Pwn2Own Ireland nebo masivní pokuty za nedostatečné přiznávání dopadů kybernetických bezpečnostních incidentů.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: milionové pokuty za nepřiznání dopadů kyberútoků

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Tým UBports, který vyvíjí operační systém Ubuntu Touch pracuje na podpoře VoLTE (Voice over LTE). Kali Linux končí s obrazy pro 32bitovou architekturu. Raspberry Pi představilo vlastní SSD disky.
articles.title: Ubuntu Touch s VoLTE, Kali Linux končí s podporou 32 bitů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: KDE s opravami a prací na Plasmě 6.3, počáteční podpora Intel Xe3 OpenGL a Vulkan v Mesa 24.3, další oprava pro notebooky Asus míří do Linuxu 6.12, Intel Core Ultra 5 245K na úrovni Ryzenu 7900.
articles.title: Korekce Meltdown Lite pro Zen 5, Intel Xe3 v Mesa 24.3

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Intel s uvedením nové procesorové generace Arrow Lake nejspíš zažije podobné kontroverze jako před necelými třemi lety s Alder Lake. Testeři jsou rozladěni a výsledky nebudou měsíc po testu nic moc vypovídat.
articles.title: Fenomén CPU Intel: výsledky testů značně různé, v čase nárůst výkonu i o desítky procent, Arrow Lake je tu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Prozkoumáme, jaký vliv mají hyperparametry modelů MLPRegressor i MLPClassifier na kvalitu natrénované neuronové sítě. Budeme přitom sledovat interní stav velmi jednoduché sítě s pouhými třemi neurony.
articles.title: Neuronové sítě v knihovně scikit-learn: dokončení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Představíme si nástroj pro správu clusterů Kubernetes, jeden hudební přehrávač, vyzkoušíme neoficiální obchod s aplikacemi pro Raspberry Pi a řekneme si o nástroji pro snadnou úpravu textu v příkazové řádce.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (23. 10. 2024): spravujte své clustery Kubernetes

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V neděli 13. října proběhl druhý den letošní konference LinuxDays. Mluvilo se o IPv6, adresaci uvnitř Kuberenetes, meshové síti Meshtastic, penetračních testech serverů a informačních systémech v dopravě.
articles.title: IPv6 v infrastruktuře, síť Meshtastic a serverová bezpečnost na LinuxDays

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Po zvukové kartě AdLib s čipem OPL2 se pro platformu PC začaly vydávat i další zvukové karty. Ty přinesly možnost přehrávání zvuků přes D/A převodník, mnohé taktéž měly A/D převodník (nahrávání).
articles.title: Vývoj zvukových karet pro platformu IBM PC po vydání karty AdLib

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Letošní OpenAlt nabídne přibližně 50 přednášek a workshopů rozdělených do pěti tematických tracků. Čekají vás přednášky, workshopy, bohatý doprovodný program a řada novinek připravených pro letošní ročník.
articles.title: Program pro OpenAlt je připraven, přijeďte 2. a 3. listopadu do Brna

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Na platformě Windows nově Firefox 132 podporuje přehrávání šifrovaných médií skrze Microsoft PlayReady, a to v 1080p i 4k/UltraHD, přičemž Mozilla postupně rozšiřuje množství partnerů, kteří přehrávání na Firefoxu podporují. Pro Windows a macOS je k dispozici podpora Wide Color Gamut WebGL, implementace v tuto chvíli podporuje 8bit DCI-P3 (časem se to snad zlepší).
articles.title: Firefox 132 s Microsoft PlayReady a post-kvantovou výměnou klíčů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Až dosud stavěl Tor Browser na starší ESR řadě Firefoxu 115.x. To se minulý týden změnilo, vydaný Tor Browser 14.0 konečně přešel na Firefox 128.x ESR, přitom ale zachovává i věci, od kterých už Mozilla upustila.
articles.title: Tor Browser 14.0, první na bázi Firefoxu 128 ESR

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Na světě je nová verze Fedory. Staví na jádru Linux 6.11 s GNOME 47, v případě KDE verze s Plasmou 6.1, dále třeba LXQt 2.0 (se zkušební podporou běhu na Waylandu). Novinkou je podpora použití kombinace uzavřeného ovladače Nvidia a Secure Bootu, kdy instalace ovladače si vyžádá zadání ověřovacího klíče, který následně při bootu je uživatelem zopakován a provede se dokončení instalace ovladače za současně pokračující podpory Secure Bootu.
articles.title: Fedora 41 s podporou Secure Bootu i na GeForce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Téměř sedm let poté, co vyšla najevo bezpečnostní chyba Spectre ovlivňující moderní procesory, nový výzkum zjistil, že nejnovější procesory AMD a Intel jsou stále náchylné ke spekulativnímu provádění útoků. Spekulativní provádění umožňuje urychlit provádění úloh tak, že předpovídá pokračující větev programu a tím efektivněji využívá zdroje procesoru.
articles.title: Nejnovější procesory AMD a Intel jsou stále náchylné ke spekulativním útokům

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Společnost initMAX pořádá sérii bezplatných webinářů zaměřených na PostgreSQL a Zabbix. Dne 30. října 2024 od 10:00 do 12:00 proběhne webinář „Řízení přístupu do PostgreSQL prostřednictvím externího autentizačního providera“. Účastníci se dozvědí, jak nastavit ověřování klientů v PostgreSQL pomocí metody GSSAPI, která se obvykle používá pro přístup k Microsoft Active Directory nebo FreeIPA.
articles.title: Série bezplatných webinářů o PostgreSQL a Zabbixu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na Kickstarteru se objevil německý malý KVM (keyboard-video-mouse) IP switch JetKVM. Na rozdíl od nedávno zmiňovaného čínského RISC-V Nano-KVM je JetKVM poháněn ARM Cortex-A7 s jedním jádrem a měl by mít lepší latenci v lokální síti (80–100 ms oproti 80–200 ms). Software by měl být také v Go a open source. V době vydání budou zdrojové kódy na GitHubu.
articles.title: JetKVM: malý KVM na Kickstarteru

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Dnes vyšla distribuce Raspberry Pi OS 2024–10–22 pro jednodeskové počítače Raspberry Pi. Hlavni novinkou je Wayland kompositor labwc místo wayfire. Je na něj doporučováno přejít prakticky všem uživatelům i těm, kteří teď mají X (například Raspberry Pi 3). Nastavení kompozitoru jde měnit v  raspi-config.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi OS 2024-10-22 s labwc

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: DTrace je framework pro dynamické debugování od Sun Microsystem, který se objevil v Solarisu, ale nyní je možné jej používat i na jiných unixových systémech. Od minulého týdne je možné DTrace 2.0 používat v distribuci Gentoo jak pro jádro tak pro aplikace. Podpora je navíc označena jako stabilní.
articles.title: DTrace 2.0 v Gentoo

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linuxových systémů přibývá, každý den se spouštějí nové servery a někdo se o ně musí starat. To znamená spoustu různých dovedností specifických právě pro linuxové prostředí. Jak to zprovoznit, kudy bezpečně dovnitř, co tam najdeme, jak se o to postaráme a jak to nastavíme nebo rozšíříme.
articles.title: Naučte se používat Linux správně a bezpečně (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Nvidia v pátek sesadila Apple z pozice nejhodnotnější společnosti na světě. Pomohla jí k tomu obrovská poptávka po specializovaných čipech pro umělou inteligenci.
articles.title: Nvidia předstihla Apple a stala se nejhodnotnější společností na světě

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Architektura i386 je již dávno zastaralá a většina distribucí už ji opustila. Nyní se k nim přidává i Kali Linux, což je specializovaná linuxová distribuce zaměřená pro penetrační testování a etické hackování. Vývojáři Kali se nyní rozhodli ukončit podporu pro 32bitovou architekturu x86.
articles.title: Kali Linux končí s podporou 32bitové architektury x86

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Prohlížeč Vivaldi vyšel ve verzi 7.0, která přináší zcela přepracované uživatelské rozhraní s plovoucími kartami, novými elegantními ikonami a přizpůsobitelným hlavním panelem. Nový dashboard soustřeďuje všechny nástroje do jednoho praktického prostoru.
articles.title: Vivaldi 7.0 přináší přepracované rozhraní s plovoucími kartami

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Soukromé rádio OFF Radio Kraków kvůli malé sledovanosti propustilo před několika měsíci své hlasatele. Od úterý rádio znova vysílá, hlasatelé jsou ale tři AI. Jsou to Jakub Zieliński (22 let, student akustického inženýrství), Emilia Nowak (20 let, studentka žurnalistiky) a Alex Szulc (23 let, student psychologie).
articles.title: OFF Radio Kraków propustilo hlasatele a vysílá s AI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Fortinet ve středu zveřejnil detaily závažné zranitelnosti CVE-2024–47575 (CWE-306) ve FortiManageru.  Chyba je přezdívaná FortiJump. Vzdálený neautentizovaný útočník může spustit libovolný kód. Uživatelé by měli aktualizovat na verze 7.6.1, 7.4.5, 7.2.8, 7.0.13, 6.4.15 a 6.2.13.
articles.title: FortiManager má závažnou bezpečnostní chybu, aktualizujte

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Proxmox je moderní virtualizační platforma, která v mnoha případech může nahradit VMware. Je open-source, zdarma a je postaven na otevřených technologiích jako KVM, LXC, CEPH a dalších. Pokud potřebujete provozovat virtualizaci, Proxmox je pro vás ideální stack a na našem workshopu Proxmox se dozvíte, jak na něj.
articles.title: Proxmox: moderní virtualizační platforma schopná nahradit VMware (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jak jsme již informovali, Greg Kroah-Hartman minulý pátek odstranil ze souboru MAINTAINERS několik ruských vývojářů s krátkým odůvodněním: „Odstranění…
articles.title: Vývojáři odstraněni ze souboru MAINTAINERS v jádře kvůli sankcím proti Rusku

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Společnost JetBrains uvolnila pro nekomerční použití svá dvě IDE: WebStorm zaměřený na vývoj webů a Rider pro C# a .NET. Pokud tato IDE používáte k nekomerčním účelům, jako je učení, vývoj projektů s otevřeným zdrojovým kódem, tvorba obsahu nebo hobby vývoj, můžete je nyní používat zdarma.
articles.title: JetBrains WebStorm a Rider jsou pro nekomerční použití zdarma

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V červnu Raspberry Pi oznámilo AI Kit s výkonem 13 TOPS, tedy Tera Operations per Second (1012). Nyní přichází jeho nástupce s názvem AI HAT+, který dosahuje dvojnásobného výkonu 26 TOPS.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi má nový AI HAT+ s výkonem až 26 TOPS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: V najnovšej verzii programovacieho jazyka Go bol do štandardnej knižnice pridaný balíček iter, ktorý umožňuje vytvárať vlastné iterátory. V rámci týchto zmien boli pridané nové funkcie do balíčkov maps a slices. Balíček slices má tieto nové funkcie:
articles.title: Go 1.23 pridáva nové funkcie pre výrezy a mapy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: radekm)
articles.description: Nově vydaný velký jazykový model Claude 3.5 Sonnet umožňuje ovládat aplikace v počítači. Funkcionalita se jmenuje computer use a je v betaverzi.
articles.title: Jazykový model Claude umí nově ovládat počítač

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: PeoplePath)
articles.description: Společnost PeoplePath pořádá v Plzni jednou za dva měsíce workshopy na různá IT témata. Tentokrát bylo téma Enterprise PHP - Příběh jedné velmi staré PHP aplikace a byl pořízen videozáznam.
articles.title: Video z workshopu Enterprise PHP

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: O knihovně Rustls se původně mluvilo jako o moderní knihovně TLS napsané v programovacím jazyce Rust, která zaručuje paměťovou bezpečnost. Kromě bezpečnostních výhod, které z toho plynou, nyní knihovna dosáhla i toho, že je rychlejší než OpenSSL i BoringSSL.
articles.title: Rustls svým výkonem překonává OpenSSL a BoringSSL

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Arm ruší licenci Qualcommu, což je pokračování boje, který začal koncem roku 2022. Tehdy Arm zažaloval firmu Qualcomm kvůli akvizici společnosti Nuvia v roce 2021. Společnost Arm totiž tvrdila, že akvizice Nuvie způsobila porušení licence společnosti Arm a požadovala, aby společnosti Qualcomm a Nuvia zničily veškeré návrhy, které společnost Nuvia vytvořila před akvizicí.
articles.title: Arm ruší licenci společnosti Qualcomm

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Představenstvo Sanfranciské městské dopravní agentury (SFMTA) souhlasilo, že vynaloží 212 milionů dolarů na to, aby se rychlodráha Muni Metro zbavila závislosti na disketách. Systém automatického řízení vlaků (ATCS) Muni Metra vyžaduje 5,25" diskety od roku 1998, kdy byl instalován na stanici metra Market Street v San Franciscu. Systém používá tři diskety pro nahrání softwaru DOS, který řídí centrální servery systému.
articles.title: San Francisco chce metro zbavit závislosti na 5,25" disketách

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Byla vydána verze 14.0 prohlížeče Tor zaměřeného na ochranu soukromí. Jedná se o první stabilní vydání založené na Firefoxu 128 ESR, které zahrnuje změny za celý rok dodané do Firefoxu. Byl také dokončen každoroční audit přechodu na ESR, při kterém vývojáři zkontrolovali a vyřešili více než 200 problémů hlášených v Bugzille týkajících se změn ve Firefoxu, které mohou negativně ovlivnit soukromí a bezpečnost uživatelů prohlížeče Tor Browser. Závěrečné zprávy z tohoto auditu jsou nyní k dispozici v repozitáři tor-browser-spec v projektové instanci GitLabu.
articles.title: Tor Browser 14.0 přechází na Firefox 128 ESR a prodlužuje podporu některých platforem

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pouze 11 % ředitelů IT oddělení firem plně implementovalo umělou inteligenci. Mají obavy o data a bezpečnost. Gitex Global 2024: Huawei představila nová řešení a vyzdvihla partnerský ekosystém. Malé a střední podniky si mohou nechat otestovat svá řešení AI. Fortinet rozšiřuje svou nabídku zabezpečení v cloudu představením Lacework FortiCNAPP. Sophos představil nové výkonné desktopové firewally řady XGS.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Malé a střední podniky si mohou nechat otestovat svá řešení AI

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 43/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Rezonátory prodlužují životnost qubitů v kvantových počítačích. Umělá inteligence se snaží porozumět štěkotu psů. Temelín testuje brýle s rozšířenou realitou.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: I Nobelova cena za chemii je vlastně za umělou inteligenci

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Taktik roste. Western Digital dodává pevné disky ePMR s nejvyšší kapacitou na světě. V IT dochází ke slučování rolí, mzdy ale stagnují. HP Scan AI Enhanced umožňuje digitalizaci pracovních postupů. TSMC plánuje další závody v Evropě, ve hře je i Česko. Umělá inteligence bude v roce 2030 vytvářet 3,5 % globálního HDP.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: TSMC plánuje další závody v Evropě, ve hře je i Česko

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 42/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Robotický lovec s umělou inteligencí ochrání kritickou infrastrukturu před útoky dronů. Antihmota v kosmickém záření znovu otevírá otázku temné hmoty v podobě části WIMP. Asteroid, který vyhubil dinosaury, mohl současně odstartovat zemědělství mravenců.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Sonda Psyche opět posunula rekord v laserové komunikaci

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Máme říjen a ti, kdo se připravují sestavit nový počítač, budou mít příležitost vyhradit si větší rozpočet na hardwarové součásti, nebo přidat nějaké další licence, které napřed u Goodoffer24.com zavrhli, a to díky mohutnám slevám nabízeným oproti oficiálnímu ceníku.
articles.title: Výprodej u Goodoffer24 na Halloween představuje Windows 11 Pro za €20 a mnoho dalších slev

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled zářijových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za září 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Soukromé cloudy by mohla čekat nová vlna zájmu. Průzkum Acronis: požadavky NIS 2 nyní splňuje jen 8 % českých firem. DC pro kvantové počítače IBM ve Frankfurtu. Nobelovu cenu za fyziku získali John Hopfield a Geoffrey Hinton – za umělou inteligenci. Průzkum HP ukazuje, jak Češi využívají domácí tiskárny. Pure Storage inovuje souborové služby.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Soukromé cloudy by mohla čekat nová vlna zájmu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 41/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Oxidy uhlíku na Uranově měsíci Ariel naznačují další důkaz pro podpovrchový oceán. Sovy jsou chytřejší než skřivani. Objevili planetu obíhající kolem hvězdy nejbližší našemu Slunci. Jaderná fakulta ČVUT získala simulátor korejského reaktoru pro elektrárnu Dukovany II.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Jak vznikají polární záře a jak o ně nepřijít?

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byl vydán Mozilla Firefox 132.0. Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání, poznámkách k vydání pro firmy a na stránce věnované vývojářům. Řešeny jsou rovněž bezpečnostní chyby. Nový Firefox 132 je již k dispozici také na Flathubu a Snapcraftu.
articles.title: Firefox 132.0

articles.author: Gréta
articles.description: Jan Gruntorád byl včera večer ve Vladislavském sále Pražského hradu během tradiční ceremonie k oslavě Dne vzniku samostatného československého státu (28. října) vyznamenán prezidentem republiky medailí Za zásluhy 1. stupně za zásluhy o stát v oblasti techniky. Gruntorád je český informatik a manažer, patří mezi průkopníky internetu v České republice a je často označovaný jako 'Otec českého internetu'. V roce 2021 byl uveden jako první Čech do Internetové síně slávy. Mezi léty 1996 až 2021 byl ředitelem sdružení CESNET.
articles.title: Jan Gruntorád byl 28. října vyznamenán medailí Za zásluhy 1. stupně

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Bylo oznámeno (cs) vydání Fedora Linuxu 41. Ve finální verzi vychází pět oficiálních edic: Workstation pro desktopové, Server pro serverové, Fedora Cloud pro cloudové nasazení, IoT pro internet věcí a Fedora CoreOS pro ty, kteří preferují neměnné systémy. Vedle nich je k dispozici také Silverblue a Kinoite a alternativní desktopy, např. KDE Plasma, Xfce nebo LxQt, a k tomu laby – upravené vydání Fedory například pro designery, robotiku, vědecké použití atd. Přehled novinek ve Fedora Workstation 41 a Fedora KDE 41 na stránkách Fedora Magazinu.
articles.title: Fedora Linux 41

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Minulý týden proběhla v Amsterdamu Blender Conference 2024. Na programu byla celá řada zajímavých přednášek. Jejich videozáznamy jsou k dispozici na YouTube.
articles.title: Videozáznamy z Blender Conference 2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla schválena první verze definice open source AI: Open Source AI Definition (OSAID) 1.0.
articles.title: Open Source AI Definition (OSAID) 1.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Minulý týden proběhla čtyřdenní hackerská soutěž Pwn2Own Ireland 2024. Hacknuta byla zařízení Lorex 2K WiFi, QNAP QHora-322, TrueNAS Mini X, Sonos Era 300, HP Color LaserJet Pro MFP 3301fdw, Canon imageCLASS MF656Cdw, QNAP TS-464 NAS, Synology TC500, Ubiquity AI Bullet, Synology DiskStation DS1823xs+, Samsung Galaxy S24, Synology BeeStation BST150-4T, AeoTec Smart Home Hub, Synology BeeStation a Lexmark CX331adwe. Celkově bylo soutěžním týmům vyplaceno přes milion dolarů za více než 70 zranitelností nultého dne (0-day). Videoshrnutí na YouTube. Po jednotlivých dnech na blogu.
articles.title: Shrnutí hackerské soutěže Pwn2Own Ireland 2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Sway (Wikipedie), dlaždicový (tiling) správce oken pro Wayland kompatibilní s i3, byl vydán ve verzi 1.10. Do vývoje se zapojilo 44 vývojářů. Přehled novinek na GitHubu. Sway 1.10 závisí na wlroots 0.18.0.
articles.title: Sway 1.10

articles.author: Heřmi
articles.description: Připojte se ve středu 30. 10. 2024 od 10:00 do 12:00 na náš webinář "Řízení přístupu do PostgreSQL prostřednictvím externího autentizačního providera" (registrace zdarma), kde vám ukážeme, jak nastavit ověřování pomocí GSSAPI. Ideální pro bezpečný přístup k databázím, ať už využíváte Microsoft Active Directory nebo FreeIPA. Záznam předchozího webináře "Co je nového v PostgreSQL 17" můžete shlédnout zde. Zveme vás na technicky zaměřený webinář "Představení Zabbix Cloud: praktická ukázka externího monitoringu" (registrace zdarma), kde vám v pátek 1. 11. 2024 od 10:00 do 12:00 představíme Zabbix Cloud. Během demo části si společně vyzkoušíme napojení a praktické použití Zabbix Cloudu pro externí monitoring standalone Zabbix instance. Ve čtvrtek 7. 11. 2024 od 10:00 do 12:00 vás zveme na webinář "Jak používat SNMP a SNMP traps v Zabbixu 7.0" (registrace zdarma), kde se naučíte správně používat SNMP a SNMP traps v Zabbixu 7.0. Projdeme instalaci komponent, konfiguraci SNMP trap na OS a nastavení Zabbix serveru pro SNMPv2 i SNMPv3. Záznam předchozího webináře "Vysoká dostupnost Zabbix serveru a Zabbix proxy ve verzi 7.0" najdete zde.
articles.title: Webináře zdarma: PostgreSQL, Zabbix Cloud a SNMP v Zabbixu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost Apple dnes představila nový 24palcový iMac s čipem M4 a oznámila dostupnost Apple Intelligence na iPhonu, iPadu a Macu.
articles.title: Nový iMac s čipem M4 a Apple Intelligence

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Raspberry Pi OS, oficiální operační systém pro Raspberry Pi, byl vydán v nové verzi 2024-10-22.  Přehled novinek v příspěvku na blogu Raspberry Pi a poznámkách k vydání. Desktop nově ve výchozím stavu běží na Waylandu a kompozitoru labwc. Vylepšena byla podpora dotykových obrazovek a také integrace s Raspberry Pi Connect.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi OS 2024-10-22

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following the rather bizarre blog post two weeks ago of laptop vendor MALIBAL suggesting not supporting Coreboot due to their frustrating experiences dealing with Coreboot consulting firms, the Coreboot project itself has now issued a response...
articles.title: Coreboot Issues Rebuttal To Recent Laptop Vendor Controversy

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: For years there have been statements about how over half of the VMs running within the Microsoft Azure public cloud are Linux-based... In a new blog post today is the first time I am seeing Microsoft cite now "over 60%" Linux marketshare on Microsoft's cloud...
articles.title: Linux Use On Microsoft Azure Crosses 60%, AlmaLinux Now An Endorsed Distro

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: CVE-2024-9632 was made public today as the latest security vulnerability affecting the X.Org Server. The CVE-2024-9632 security issue has been present in the codebase now for 18 years and can lead to local privilege escalation...
articles.title: Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability Affecting X.Org Server For 18 Years

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Earlier this year Micron announced the Crucial Pro DDR5-6000 memory for AMD and Intel desktops and catering to gamers. With the newest AMD Ryzen 9000 series (Zen 5) and Intel Core Ultra Series 2 (Arrow Lake) processors out there and enjoying even faster memory, today Micron announced the Crucial Pro DDR5-6400 memory kits for greater performance. In advance of today's launch I have been testing the Crucial Pro DDR5-6400 32GB Kit (16GBx2) UDIMM Kit (CP2K16G64C38U5B) and have some initial benchmarks to share from the new Intel Core Ultra 9 285K Arrow Lake desktop.
articles.title: Crucial Pro DDR5-6400 32GB Kit Performance With Intel Arrow Lake

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Fedora 41 is ready for release today as a wonderful update to this leading edge Linux distribution...
articles.title: Fedora 41 Releases Today With Many Shiny New Features

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: It looks like the upcoming Linux 6.13 cycle will be adding RISC-V support for user-space pointer masking and tagged address ABI...
articles.title: RISC-V User-Space Pointer Masking Appears Ready For Linux 6.13

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: A set of patches are currently under review on the Linux kernel mailing list for helping to further lower idle power use for Xeon 6 Sierra Forest processors...
articles.title: Linux Patches Aim To Further Lower Intel Sierra Forest Idle Power Use

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Thanks to Valve's Linux graphics team, VK_EXT_device_generated_commands is now supported by the Radeon "RADV" Vulkan driver with the upcoming Mesa 24.3 release...
articles.title: RADV Vulkan Driver Merges Device Generated Commands Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Google's open-source and cross-platform Flutter UI toolkit has been forked by community developers as Flock...
articles.title: Google's Flutter UI Toolkit Forked As Flock

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: David Rosca working for AMD has continued to improve their open-source video acceleration support within Mesa. Merged today for Mesa 24.3 is the code within the Gallium3D video acceleration front-end and the RadeonSI Gallium3D driver for handling AV1 still picture encode...
articles.title: AV1 Still Picture Encoding Merged For Mesa 24.3 Radeon Driver

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: KDE developer Vlad Zahorodnii is out with an insightful blog post today on how XWayland window resizing has been enhanced for Plasma 6.3 so that resizing X11 clients will now appear much more polished than the status quo...
articles.title: KDE Plasma 6.3 To Improve XWayland Window Resizing

articles.author: Michael Larabel

Thanks to the predominantly online nature of the Call of Duty Black Ops 6 modes, it's highly essential to prevent Packets Burst issues as much as possible.


A staple of any online video game, this is a particular term that all gamers hate to hear. In simple words, a Packet Burst is the loss of data connectivity with the servers. When the required amount of data doesn't reach the servers in their entire form, you'll get an Orange icon on the left side of your screen. When that happens, your game will suddenly become highly laggy, which, in a competitive FPS, can be troublesome. Thankfully, there are a few tips and tricks that you can try.


Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Packet Burst issue solutions


Typically, Packet Bursts can happen due to network issues, and Call of Duty Black Ops 6 require…

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
EA FC 25 players have run into a roadblock regarding their Ultimate Team experience. A new error is preventing the release of new live-service content, including SBCs.


Squad Building Challenges are incredibly popular pieces of content as they allow players to get unique cards, packs, and more. Unfortunately, an unknown error seems to have occurred, which is preventing the addition of all forms of new content. EA Sports has acknowledged and notified the community, but things look pretty grim as of writing.


EA FC 25 Ultimate Team error explained


There have been occurrences in the past when the planned content released by EA Sports hasn't gone as planned. The latest issue seems to have been caused by the switch from daylight savings. Usually, that shouldn't be a problem, as the content's release time remains at 6 p.m. UK Time. Unfortunately, no fresh content has been released as of writing, and it's already a few minutes past the deadline.




Nobody exactly knows what appears to be the problem. EA Sports has remained tight-lipped on the issue, but you can bookmark this tweet to stay updated on the situation. So far, only the Rush objectives have been renewed on October 29. However, there have been no special fodder SBCs or player SBCs as of writing.


It remains to be seen whether the issue will be fixed immediately or will take longer. Based on the rumors, we are supposed to get an RTTK/Total Rush Party Bag SBC very soon, which will assure you a promo item. Sadly, the Ultimate Team error has ruined the mood of many community members.


Once the issue is over and new SBCs are released, we will be back with detailed guides about their cheapest solutions. In the meantime, make sure to check out the solutions of the Max 88 Base Icon Upgrade and Max 88 Hero Upgrade SBC. These SBCs guarantee you an Icon and Hero card, respectively. 

The post EA FC 25 Ultimate Team error stops the release of SBCs and live content appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 25 Ultimate Team error stops the release of SBCs and live content

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Call of Duty Black Ops 6 is now live, and we have confirmation about when Season 1 will begin.


Like all the recent COD titles, the upcoming shooter's live content will be divided into seasons. The start of the first season also marks the integration of Warzone into the new title, so the date is of prime importance. Till now, Activision has remained tight-lipped about when the new season will go live. Thankfully, an official confirmation is available regarding the release date. 


Call of Duty Black Ops Season 1 expected release date


We already had hints about the release date from a Little Caesar's promo, which reportedly set the release date of Season 1 at November 14. Now that we have confirmation, the first season is indeed going to be released on November 14. 


Once Season 1 goes live, you'll be able to access the Battle Pass as well. It will be exciting to find out the exact content which will be part of the pass. As usual, there will be more rewards on the Premium version, which can be unlocked with tokens/Vault Edition upgrade.




Season 1 is supposed to introduce Area 99, and Activision has advised the players to unlock all their gears and strengthen them as much as possible. So far, there's no hint of the exact content coming as part of the new season. Players can expect plenty of free content, however, which will span across multiple modes. 


Additionally, the much-hyped Omnimovement and the loadout system of Black Ops 6 will integrate with Call of Duty Warzone. If you're of the impatient type, November 1 marks the introduction of Nuketown to Black Ops 6. Additionally, the Infected mode is also coming to the game to celebrate Halloween. It's going to provide players with a different way to enjoy the undead, but you can always jump to the more traditional experience. 

The post When will Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Season 1 start? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: When will Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Season 1 start?

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Lords of the Fallen made its debut on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S a year ago, and now it has plans for Sony's upgraded console. Publisher CI Games and developer Hexworks confirmed plans for PlayStation 5 Pro enhancements, which aim to give the action RPG even more of a visual boost.


On PS5 Pro, Lords of the Fallen promises "a 40% increase in pixel density over the base PlayStation 5 console." Visuals in Performance Mode have been upscaled from 1440p to 4K60, locking the action in at 60 frames per second while increasing the clarity of details in the distance. Character and environmental textures have also been refined.


Those who prefer to play on Quality Mode can look forward to a native 4K30 experience, "showcasing intricate visuals across the dual realms of Axiom and Umbral at a stable 30 FPS."


Future of the fallen


Screenshot via CI Games


Since it hit consoles and PC, Lords of the Fallen has had a number of post-launch updates and content releases, including the Clash of Champions boss rush mode that arrived back in May. Hexworks isn't done with it at this point, even without the Pro enhancements taken into consideration. 


There are further updates and enhancements on the way across all platforms. While we don't know much about the specifics just yet, many of them are apparently based on player feedback, so it should be interesting to see what they have in store for everyone.


There's also that sequel that was referenced in CI Games' roadmap. Whether or not it ends up hitting the 2026 window with the promised "elevated production values," for now we can get a taste of some visual improvements when PS5 Pro launches in November. 

The post Lords of the Fallen details PlayStation 5 Pro enhancements appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Lords of the Fallen details PlayStation 5 Pro enhancements

articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
Crossplay is a great feature that brings together several players from different platforms in the same match in Black Ops 6. But unlike PC users, console users don’t have the upper hand since aiming with the controller is extremely difficult. 


If you are a console user just like me and frustrated with matching against the PC players, then you should follow this comprehensive guide that lets you disable crossplay in Black Ops 6.


How to disable crossplay in Black Ops 6 on PlayStation


Image via Activision


Turning off crossplay in Black Ops 6 on PlayStation is very simple. Follow these steps:



Step 1: First, open Black Ops 6 on your PlayStation 5 or 4.


Step 2: Once opened, head to the settings menu and choose the “Accounts and Networks” sub-menu.


Step 3: In the “Accounts and Networks” sub-menu, search for the “Online” section.


Step 4: In the “Online” section, you can find the “Crossplay” option. Use that option to disable the crossplay.



How to disable crossplay in Black Ops 6 on Xbox


In Xbox, you have to manually disable the crossplay from the settings. Here are the steps:



Step 1: First, you have to press the Xbox Guide button from your controller and open the Profile and System menu.


Step 2: Now go to the Xbox settings and head to the “Account” sub-menu.


Step 3: Go to the “Privacy and Online” Settings and enter your Xbox PIN. Once you have entered the pin, choose “Xbox Privacy.”


Step 4: Now go to the “View Details and Customize” page and head to the “Communication and Network” option.


Step 5: From there, find the “You can join cross-network play’ option and choose the “Block” option.



Also, PC users can’t disable crossplay in Black Ops 6. That also means any users who have handheld consoles like Steam Deck, ROG Ally, etc. can’t disable it either.

The post Black Ops 6: How to disable Crossplay appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Black Ops 6: How to disable Crossplay

Platinum Crystals are always a bit of an issue in Once Human, especially towards the start of the season. And with The Way of Winter being a little sparse of great farming spots, like BLackfell on the old map, you might be wondering where to find Platinum Crystals in The Way of Winter. 


I've got you covered, with a particular spot where you can easily grab 30+ Platinum Crystals in just 20 odd minutes. Let's dive in. 


Best Platinum Crystal farm in The Way of Winter


First, you'll need to be in at least Phase 2 for this farm spot to open up for you. You'll want to head for Sunshroud Cave, which can be found at the coordinates (-5892,7267) in Ember Strand - Land of Shadows.


There are two nearby towers to choose from, namely the Snakebelly and the Snakeye Pass Teleportation Tower. If yo…
articles.title: Quickest Platinum Crystal farm in The Way of Winter (30+ per run)

articles.author: Aleksa Stojkovic
articles.description:
Progression in Fisch is slow, and every time you get a new rod, it will feel like a major milestone. Then, you'll also want to enchant your rods to make them the best they can be. To help you with that, here is a complete guide on how to enchant your rod in Fisch, including a list of all possible enchants and their effects.


Table of Contents
How to Enchant a Fishing Rod in Fisch
List of All Enchants in Fisch
Best Enchants For Each Rod in Fisch


How to Enchant a Fishing Rod in Fisch



Screenshot by Destructoid



To enchant a rod in Fisch, you'll first need to acquire an Enchant Relic. Enchant Relics can be found with a ~1/500 chance anytime you fish (mutations on caught enchants are irrelevant) or bought from Merlin at Sunstone Island (930, 225, 990) for C$11,000 after you reach level …
articles.title: Ultimate Fisch Roblox Rod Enchant Guide

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
During the opening night live event at August's Gamescom, Grinding Gear Games revealed plans to bring Path of Exile 2 to Early Access on November 15. Things have changed, though, and folks who have been eagerly awaiting this one will need to hold out a little longer.


According to Grinding Gear's latest update on the project, Path of Exile 2's Early Access release has been delayed to December 6, 2024. Game director Jonathan Rogers shared the news in a video on the game's official website and social channels, starting off with a quick intro and an apologetic announcement. 


"Unfortunately, I have some really bad news. We have to delay Early Access for three weeks," he began. He addressed the fact that people even tend to plan time off for their launches, but said they "just have to do it." 




As Rogers noted in the video, the game itself isn't the issue at hand. The delay came about as the result of "a bunch of server-side infrastructure work that has taken us a lot longer than we expected." 


Some of this has to do with fulfilling the promise that all microtransactions will work across Path of Exile 1 and 2. To pull that off, they have to integrate the account systems for both games, as well as the platforms. A bunch of new systems had to be created in the process, all of which needed to be backward compatible with the old data. 


He said that while he was actually confident they could have made the original launch date, he wasn't certain they could do it without making mistakes. "When you're migrating databases that are this old and with this much data, you find all sorts of strange demons in there," Rogers added. 


The only strange demons we're looking to battle are the ones in the game, and it sounds like this will hopefully be the last snag before we can do so. Beyond that, the team will also have a livestream to talk about all the content players can expect in Early Access in "about four weeks."  

The post Path of Exile 2 Early Access gets pushed back three weeks appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Path of Exile 2 Early Access gets pushed back three weeks

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
For those who enjoy their shooters weird, there's just no better option on the market right now than Sulfur. Having only just come out via Steam Early Access, Sulfur follows up on its excellent April demo with a surprisingly content-heavy beta launch. Notably, the aforementioned demo is still around!


If you'd forgive my excitement, it's not often that I get so taken aback by an Early Access release. Sulfur is absolutely choc-full of content already and though it's a tad rough around certain edges still, owing to it being objectively unfinished, I cannot recommend it enough. It's a solo dungeon crawler/extraction shooter hybrid that offers almost hilariously intricate weapon customization and cooking (yup) mechanics. Combine those with genuinely stellar gunplay, and you get a winning comb…
articles.title: Gun-customizing, goblin-slaying FPS Sulfur is out now, and you should play it

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
Though it has been inevitable from the get-go, nobody really knew when Bungie's upcoming extraction shooter, Marathon, would make an appearance on Steam. Happily, it's just happened, and to celebrate the occasion, game director Joe Ziegler chimed in on how the development is going and what Marathon is.


Ziegler's vlog comes in at just under 10 minutes' worth of runtime and I recommend it for anyone even remotely interested in Marathon. On top of the obvious boon that is an honest-to-goodness explanation of Marathon's core gameplay loop, Ziegler also said that Bungie's been executing some "aggressive [changes]" on Marathon over the past couple of years. Promising news? Perhaps, but Ziegler also essentially confirmed that Marathon's Runners will be pre-existing character archetypes instead …
articles.title: Bungie’s Marathon is now on Steam, with a new dev vlog

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
There are several cool Easter Eggs in Liberty Falls, and you can gain some extra power ups while playing the Zombies mode in Call of Duty Black Ops 6.


Power ups are beneficial as the different multipliers give you an added advantage against the undead. But they're purely random in terms of when they will drop and what the multiplier will be. In Liberty Falls, the bonus power ups aren't random. Once you find them on the map, you can activate them by just shooting at the correct spot.


All bonus power ups in Black Ops 6 Liberty Falls


There are several important locations in Liberty Falls, and there are five free power ups to unlock. These five power ups are spread across the locations, so make sure to check them all out.


Power Up type
Where to find




Bonus Points
You can activate a …
articles.title: How to get bonus power ups in Black Ops 6 (BO6 Liberty Falls Easter Egg)

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
One of the most important events you'll find in Monopoly GO is Golden Blitz. Since you can't trade gold stickers outside of this event, it's a rare opportunity to get specific cards during brief 24-hour periods before being restricted to card pack opening again. 


It's also rare for Golden Blitz events to repeat past cards, meaning you might miss out on one you need if you're not online during a specific time. Let's check out every past Golden Blitz sticker during the Monopoly Games season to determine whether you'll still get an opportunity to trade a particular card.


Updated October 29 2024: Added information about the ongoing Marvel season, the latest Golden Blitz event, and a timeline for when the next will begin.


All past Golden Blitz stickers in Monopoly GO


Since Monopoly GO's…
articles.title: Monopoly GO: All past Golden Blitz stickers, listed

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Sony’s inaugural console had a pretty deep library, so it’s no wonder the list of standout titles is so long. It's also a well-loved console, so the PS1 is well-trodden territory now. What would go on a "best of" list is generally well-solidified for most people. 


So, this isn't a ranked list, and it isn't a list of the best, but rather games you might have overlooked. I don't particularly like ranked list, since I don't think they're that useful. I say this as someone who's written a few. There's no accounting for taste and comparing something like Metal Gear Solid to Twisted Metal 2 isn't very insightful. Also, I don't really like Metal Gear Solid, and you probably already know how you feel about it. Me throwing it at a low rank isn't going to change your mind.


I prefer to just talk …
articles.title: Try These 20 PS1 Games – A Few Of The Best Playstation 1 Games Of All Time

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
The Forever Winter was released via Steam Early Access late in September, dominating the co-op extraction shooter niche thanks to its hardcore gameplay and a ridiculously grimdark take on future warfare. Now, the developer Fun Dog is pushing out a new Steam demo to help undecided players check it out.


Notably, while there's plenty of merit in The Forever Winter's gameplay, lore, and aesthetic, some of the game's more hardcore elements haven't panned out with its fledgling community. The Forever Winter is a single-player and co-op horror shooter that attempts to de-emphasize combat in lieu of scavenging, and water is a key resource in particular. The bit that players haven't liked from day one onwards is the fact that, once your water meter fully runs out, your progress and inventory get …
articles.title: The Forever Winter just got a fancy Steam demo

articles.author: Jonathan Wright
articles.description:
It's quite possible for psychological thrillers to leave you scared, jittery, and constantly looking over your shoulders, but there's something about the knife-cutting tension underlying these stories that makes them utterly irresistible.


From rural sociopaths with amnesia to strange, inexplicable phenomena occurring in a clandestine site, here are the best psychological thriller books you can get your hands on in 2024.


Sharp Objects by Gillian Flynn


via Crown


Gillian Flynn is the unrivaled master of psychological thrillers, and even her breakthrough novel, Sharp Objects, released in 2006, remains one of the best books you could read in this genre. The story follows Camille Preaker, a journalist who covers crime stories. Camille is dissatisfied with her job, and when she is sent to…
articles.title: The 10 best psychological thriller books that will leave you haunted for years to come

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan-based publishing giant Shueisha has asked a court in the United States to issue an order that requires Google, VISA & PayPal to provide information on several pirate site operators. Shueisha's goal is to obtain enough information on these currently anonymous individuals so that it can file lawsuits against them in Japan. A DMCA subpoena obtained earlier against Cloudflare appears to have provided plenty of fresh leads.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Shueisha Hunts Manga Pirates But Needs Google, PayPal & VISA to Assist

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
For two decades, high quality screener rips leaked on pirate sites toward the end of the year. That 'tradition' ended a few years ago. More recently, however, there's been some excitement around a seemingly new type of leak, tagged "Theater". Are these high quality copies ripped from DCPs, or is something else going on?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Mysterious “Theater” Rips Cause Excitement in Piracy Circles

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Anti-piracy campaign BeStreamWise has been quietly expanding its membership since its launch just over a year ago. Hoping to suppress use of pirate IPTV, mostly in connection with live football, Sky, Premier League, and FACT have been busy driving the messaging home via the media. More quietly behind the scenes, however, the declared supporters list has been expanding with the BBC, DAZN, NBCUniversal, and the Police Intellectual Property Crime Unit, among others.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: BeStreamWise: Police, BBC, & DAZN Quietly Added to IPTV Piracy Campaign

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Transformers One' tops the chart, followed by 'Alien: Romulus'. 'Venom: The Last Dance' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 10/28/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Brazil is considering legislation that would prohibit streaming services from charging additional fees or blocking access for users outside the registered 'household'. Representing major Hollywood studios and streaming giants like Netflix, the MPA is pushing back against these plans. Such restrictions would negatively impact revenue and undermine copyright enforcement efforts, the industry group warns
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MPA is Concerned About Plans to ‘Outlaw’ Password Sharing Restrictions

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Early this year, a court in the UK handed Paul Merrell a 12-month prison sentence for reselling pirate IPTV subscriptions. A respected headteacher and family man, with an otherwise clean record, the 42-year-old was hardly the stereotypical pirate often portrayed in the media. A document detailing Merrell's failed appeal recently came to light, shining new light on his unusual case.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV’s ‘Breaking Bad’ Headteacher Risked More Than Most, Paid the Price

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
With almost no legal access to popular Western movies, Russian cinemas have been selling tickets to short local movies to disguise the unlicensed screening of major Hollywood movies shown during the same sitting. Depending on the direction of the wind, Moscow turns a blind eye or warns of a crackdown on pre-screening piracy, including one expected anytime now. In parallel, legal streaming platforms are enjoying huge growth as business booms.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Warning For Russian Cinemas as Legal Streaming Revenues Skyrocket

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
A copyright lawsuit between popular adult site nHentai and the Californian company PCR Distributing has taken an interesting turn. Nhentai requested a protective order, in which it argues that PCR granted written permission to use its content. The rightsholder also contemplated running ads on the site, nHentai says.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: nHentai Fights Back in Piracy Lawsuit: ‘Rightsholder Gave Permission’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Authorities in New Zealand recently confirmed that Kim Dotcom will be extradited to the United States to face a criminal prosecution in connection with Megaupload, the file-hosting site he founded. In the United States, the 500 companies and 300,000 members of anti-piracy coalition CreativeFuture, are celebrating already. The extradition "of one of the internet era’s leading jackasses" takes place through the medium of an interactive quiz.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: CreativeFuture Celebrates Kim Dotcom’s Extradition Via Interactive Quiz

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cox Communications is fighting a writ of certiorari filed by several record labels at the U.S. Supreme Court. The music companies argue that ISPs can be held vicariously liable for pirating subscribers, even when they don't directly profit from this activity. Cox argues that this "radical new theory" would make ISPs liable for virtually anything their users do online.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox Asks Supreme Court to Reject Record Labels’ Petition over ISPs ‘Piracy Profits’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Seattle Seahawks cornerback Tariq Woolen, who reportedly earns over $1 million a year, used pirate streaming site MethStreams to watch his own team play. This revelation came from Woolen's Instagram story, where he shared an image clearly displaying the site's URL. While Woolen seemed unconcerned when the news reached him, the NFL, which actively combats piracy, will likely take a different view.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: NFL Player Uses Pirate Streaming Site to Watch His Own Team

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After Italy's Piracy Shield system blocked Google Drive last weekend, telecoms regulator AGCOM says that if Google had fully collaborated in the fight against piracy, the disruption could've been easily avoided. Meanwhile, an expert has raised the alarm over Piracy Shield's security, warning that nobody knows whether a bad actor has infiltrated the platform. Google Drive today, but will it be trains, hospitals, and government infrastructure tomorrow?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Victim Blamed For Piracy Shield Blunder, Warning Over Infiltration Risk

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Polish streaming service CDA has once again been accused of being a notorious piracy market by the Motion Picture Association (MPA). CDA sent a rebuttal to the US government, dismissing the claims as false and misleading. In addition, the company points out that the MPA was provided with a direct takedown tool but has never used it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MPA’s Piracy Claims are ‘False’ and ‘Misleading’, Streaming Platform Says

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After blocking Cloudflare to prevent IPTV piracy just a few months ago, on Saturday the rightsholders behind Piracy Shield ordered Italy's ISPs to block Google Drive. The subsequent nationwide blackout, affecting millions of Italians, wasn't just a hapless IP address blunder. This was the reckless blocking of a Google.com subdomain that many 10-year-olds could identify as being important. Reckless people and internet infrastructure, what could possibly go wrong next?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Drive Blackout in Italy After Another Major Anti-Piracy Blunder

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The ESA, which represents several major gaming companies, has shared an updated list of notorious piracy threats with the U.S. Government. One of the notable newcomers is FitGirl-Repacks, which has been a dominant player in the game piracy landscape for years. Meanwhile, ESA's report no longer mentions malware, cryptocurrencies, or Scene release groups, which were previously seen as 'growing trends'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Game Companies List ‘FitGirl-Repacks’ as a Key Piracy Threat

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Court of Rome has ordered Cloudflare to take action against one of its customers, pirate streaming site 'Guardaserie'. Cloudflare is required to disconnect the site and block related domain names, including those that are registered in the future. In addition, the company must share information that can help to identify the operator. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Orders Cloudflare to Block and Identify ‘Pirate Site’ Customer

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The Court of Justice of the European Union has handed a historic victory to Datel, the company behind video game cheat device Action Replay. For well over a decade, Sony argued that modification of game generated code amounted to copyright infringement. The CJEU judgment holds that there was no violation of Sony's rights, since Action Replay ran alongside Sony's game code, only modifying values in RAM while leaving object code untouched.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sony Loses as CJEU Rules Datel’s RAM Data ‘Cheat’ Non-Copyright Infringing

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy is suffering downtime again today. While the site no longer spooks its visitors with cryptic messages, the repeated issues are somewhat unusual. TorrentGalaxy reportedly changed owners, which could partly explain the recent troubles. This is another chapter in the unusual history of the site, which originated in the 1337x chatbox after ExtraTorrent shut down.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy Has a Rough Start Under New Owners

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
City of London Police say a man was arrested this week as part of an operation to disrupt the supply of pirate IPTV subscriptions in the UK. After targeting a residential address and four business addresses in the West Midlands, police say a 38-year-old man was detained on suspicion of copyright and money laundering offenses. Police also shared photos taken during the operation, a relative rarity these days but a welcome source of additional information nonetheless.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Server Shut Down as City of London Police Target UK ‘Bulk Seller’

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (Kartik)
articles.description:
Unrest is a roleplaying game developed by Pyrodactyl Studios set in a fantasy interpretation of ancient India. You’ll step into the shoes of ordinary people and navigate a world fraught with challenges as they strive for safety, freedom, and peace.
We are proud to announce that Unrest is now playable using ScummVM thanks to the work done by our GSoC student, Kartik Agarwala! Help us test the game by grabbing a daily build of ScummVM. Read through our testing guidelines, and please take some screenshots along the way. If you encounter any issues, please report them to our bugtracker.
If you don’t own Unrest, you can purchase this game from either GOG or Steam. The demo for the game is also supported and available from our web site.
Now go, use your manipulative skills to bring peace to this troubled world where chaos is not afar. For the most daring players using the iron-man mode, saving and loading the game is only available using ScummVM's Global Main Menu.
>
articles.title: “Can you bring peace to.. UNREST?”

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (jibbodahibbo, Bosca)
articles.description:
Backyard Basketball, is finally ready to come off the bench for some sweet public testing! You can now play again on ScummVM this beloved Backyard Sports title (not to mention the last unsupported game on the SCUMM engine). Play with the Backyard Kids and even create five of your own! This game also features (now former) NBA and WNBA stars Kevin Garnett and Lisa Leslie!
Much like the other sports titles of this franchise, controls are point-and-click by default, with gamepad and keyboard options. Pick your favorite kids and play some 3 on 3 basketball. Don't forget your 110% Juice or Dunking Donut for a slamma jamma! Pass that ball in, listen to the live commentary from Sunny Day and Barry DeJay and shoot some jumpers on your way to a championship.
Are you ready to play? Dig up your good old CD and fire up the latest daily build!
>
articles.title: “What Time is it? GAME TIME HOO!”

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Méně erudovaný divák si může říkat, že jde o vydařenou, profesionálně natočenou, nepřístupnou sexy komedii, která je místy (hlavně ke konci) dost divná a nějak skřípe. Více erudovaný divák si může říkat, že to je odvážná hra s žánry a možná dokonce i nastavování zrcadel něčemu. Každopádně je to originální zážitek, který skoro nenudí a vypadá až překvapivě výpravně (vzhledem k omezenému rozpočtu). (Ilča 100 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Anora - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Mylně jsem se domníval, že jdu na film o problematice eutanázie. Ale místo toho Toltékové, astrální cestování, život po životě, reinkarnace a Jaroslav Dušek. Hodně podobné jako "Tajemství a smysl života", ale o něco méně WTF a výrazně kratší. Každopádně velmi fádní a nudné, pokud od začátku nevěříte tomu, co je vám cpáno. (Ilča 20 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tajemství smrti - 30 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Zdaleka nelepší černobílé drama o íránských džudistkách v Gruzii, jaké jsem v životě viděl. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tatami - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Film, ve kterém většinu času není vůbec jasné, jaká je zrovna motivace které postavy na plátně (např. jestli právě dělá vtip, nebo jestli se bojí o svůj život). To je jeho největší a soustavný problém, ale má i mnoho dalších, například arabské teroristy z "Návratu do budoucnosti" a pointu, spočívající v tom, že veřejnoprávní média vám non-stop lžou a vy jim to štastně žerete (což je pointa pravděpodobně nezamýšlená, protože film spoluprodukoval Český rozhlas). Je velmi smutné vidět dílo, na kterém pracovali lidi, o kterých víme, že jsou schopni vyprodukovat něco zajímavého, a výsledek dopadl takto strašlivě. (Ilča 10 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Výjimečný stav - 20 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Není to kvalitní film, ale je šílený a není nudný ani rutinní. Je to výpověď o tom, co si Coppola na stará kolena myslí o světě a o filmařině - a taková výpověď mě zajímá. Ale kdyby to přesně stejně natočil 25letý absolvent filmové akademie, měl bych z toho jen legraci a vysmíval bych se jeho neschopnosti. (Ilča 60%)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Megalopolis - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kdybych teoreticky měl pěti- až osmileté dítě, hrozně bych chtěl, aby se mu tenhle film líbil. Kdyby mu bylo 10 nebo 12 let, už bych mu nepouštěl tohle, ale první Bayovy Transformers. Je to fajn, ale je to opravdu jen a pouze pro děti. A navíc, viděl jsem dabovanou verzi a rozhodně byla méně zábavná než tři minuty ukázek v původním znění, které jsem viděl taky. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Transformers Jedna [Transformers One] - 50 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Prvních 30 minut psychologická sci-fi, posledních 30 minut absurdní groteska. A z jednoho do druhého se to překlopí velmi nápaditě, promyšleně a zvolna. Představte si "Evil Dead 2" nebo "Braindead", ale pro současného diváka a s nějakou tou myšlenkou navíc. Všichni zúčastnění zaslouží pochvalu, protože  tento projekt velmi snadno mohl dopadnout hrozně. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Substance [The Substance] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Dnes pokec (s Jakubem Červinkou) o epické videohře, kterou byste si neměli nechat ujít, a jejíž jediným problémem je, že má příliš pomalý rozjezd. Tento podcast je výjimečně k dispozici také na YouTube.
articles.title: Videohra: Warframe - 100 % (Host: Jakub Červinka)

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Hodně mi to připomnělo "On se bojí" nebo filmy Charlieho Kaufmana. "Jiný člověk" je ale "tlumenější" a první půlhodinu vypadá skoro jako normální film, který možná není úplně podařeně natočený. Teprve pak to začne být opravdu divné a vyjde najevo, že to od počátku všechno byl sofistikovaný plán filmařů a že tím asi chtěli něco říct. (Ilča 70 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Jiný člověk [A Different Man] - 70 %
